ST14-001.name: Monkey D. Luffy ST14-001
ST14-001.effect: [DON!! x1] All of your Characters gain +1 cost. If you have a Character with a cost of 8 or more, this Leader gains +1000 power.

ST14-002.name: Usopp ST14-002
ST14-002.effect: [DON!! x1] [When Attacking] If you have a Character with a cost of 8 or more, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.

ST14-003.name: Sanji ST14-003
ST14-003.effect: [On Play] If you have a Character with a cost of 6 or more, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less.

ST14-004.name: Jinbe ST14-004
ST14-004.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] Up to 1 of your black {Straw Hat Crew} type Characters gains +2 cost until the end of your opponent's next turn.

ST14-006.name: Nami ST14-006
ST14-006.effect: [Blocker] [On Play] If you have 6 or less cards in your hand and a Character with a cost of 8 or more, draw 1 card.

ST14-007.name: Nico Robin ST14-007
ST14-007.effect: [On Play]/[When Attacking] If you have a Character with a cost of 8 or more, give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters âˆ’5 cost during this turn.

ST14-008.name: Haredas ST14-008
ST14-008.effect: [Activate: Main] You may rest this Character: Up to 1 of your black {Straw Hat Crew} type Characters gains +2 cost until the end of your opponent's next turn. Then, if you have a Character with a cost of 8 or more, draw 1 card and trash 1 card from your hand.

ST14-009.name: Franky ST14-009
ST14-009.effect: [DON!! x1] [Opponent's Turn] If you have a Character with a cost of 6 or more, this Character cannot be K.O.'d by your opponent's effects and gains +2000 power.

ST14-011.name: Heracles ST14-011
ST14-011.effect: [Activate: Main] You may rest this Character: Up to 1 of your black {Straw Hat Crew} type Characters gains +2 cost until the end of your opponent's next turn.

ST14-012.name: Monkey D. Luffy ST14-012
ST14-012.effect: If you have a Character with a cost of 10 or more, this Character gains [Rush].

ST14-014.name: Gum-Gum Giant Rifle ST14-014
ST14-014.effect: [Counter] If you have a Character with a cost of 8 or more, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +3000 power during this battle. [Trigger] Add up to 1 of your Character cards with a cost of 2 or less from your trash to your hand.

ST14-015.name: Gum-Gum Diable Three-Swords Style Mouten Jet Six Hundred Pound Phoenix Cannon ST14-015
ST14-015.effect: [Main] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +3000 power during this turn. Then, if you have a Character with a cost of 8 or more, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less. [Trigger] If you have a Character with a cost of 8 or more, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less.

ST14-016.name: I Have My Crew!! ST14-016
ST14-016.effect: [Main] Draw 1 card. Then, up to 1 of your Characters gains +3 cost until the end of your opponent's next turn. [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

ST14-017.name: Thousand Sunny ST14-017
ST14-017.effect: All of your black {Straw Hat Crew} type Characters gain +1 cost. [On Play] If your Leader has the {Straw Hat Crew} type, draw 1 card.
